duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide orthopedic consultations and surgical procedures, primarily in joint replacements, sports medicine/arthroscopic surgery, and some trauma.
Serve as the team physician for the department of athletics and provide weekly training room and home event coverage.
Offer orthopedic and sports medicine services to Upper Iowa University (UIU) and Luther College athletics departments.
Engage in potential outreach to surrounding communities within a 60-mile radius.
Function as a part of orthopedics and sports medicine department supported by the WinnMed Rehab and Sports Medicine Department.

Contribute to the implementation of a long-range master facility plan with significant investment over the next 3 years in renovation and new construction for a new medical office building, obstetrical department, and new robotics capable operating rooms.
Explore and contribute to the organizational commitment in exploring orthopedic robotics program.

education_certification.credential: Board certified or board eligible orthopedic surgeon
